I have to say I expected better of you.  I don't find that amusing or even 
uplifting.  In fact it encourages discrimination against all middle 
easterners.  I'm disturbed and ashamed that someone would write such a thing.

--part1_cf.bff1da8.28dea08a_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>I have to say I expected better of you.  I don't find that amusing or even uplifting.  In fact it encourages discrimination against all middle easterners.  I'm disturbed and ashamed that someone would write such a thing.</FONT></HTML>

--part1_cf.bff1da8.28dea08a_boundary--
